speed_modifier.label: Key Speed Modifier:
speed_modifier.description: If this key is held, movement/zoom/pan/scroll/etc. operations will go faster. (avoid changing, Shift and Ctrl are the only other working options and those cause various conflicts.)

line_modifier.label: Line Drawing Modifier:
line_modifier.description: When held, drawing tools will draw a line from the last point.

fixed_angle_modifier.label: Fixed Angle Modifier:
fixed_angle_modifier.description: When held, drawing tools will be constrained to a fixed angle.

pan_view_modifier.label: Pan View Modifier:
pan_view_modifier.description: When held, click and drag to pan the image view

fixed_aspect_modifier.label: Fixed Aspect Ratio Modifier:
fixed_aspect_modifier.description: When held, shape and transform tools will keep a fixed aspect ratio.

eyedropper_override_modifier.label: Color Picker Override Modifier:
eyedropper_override_modifier.description: When held, temporarily switch from the brush or fill tool to the color picker.

zoom_toggle.label: Toggle zoom:
zoom_toggle.description: Switch between close-up and zoomed out views

move_left.label: Move left:
move_left.description: Move the image generation area left

move_right.label: Move right:
move_right.description: Move the image generation area right

move_up.label: Move up:
move_up.description: Move the image generation area up

move_down.label: Move down:
move_down.description: Move the image generation area down

brush_size_increase.label: Increase brush size:
brush_size_increase.description: Increase the size of the active brush

brush_size_decrease.label: Decrease brush size:
brush_size_decrease.description: Increase the size of the active brush

brush_tool_key.label: Switch to the brush tool:
brush_tool_key.description: Activate the brush tool to draw into the image.

eyedropper_tool_key.label: Switch to the color picker tool:
eyedropper_tool_key.description: Activate the color picker tool to change the brush color.

transform_tool_key.label: Switch to the layer transformation tool:
transform_tool_key.description: Activate the layer transformation tool to move, scale, or rotate layers.

selection_tool_key.label: Switch to the selection tool:
selection_tool_key.description: Activate the selection tool to mark areas for editing.

selection_fill_tool_key.label: Switch to the area selection tool:
selection_fill_tool_key.description: Activate the area selection tool to mark areas for editing.

shape_selection_tool_key.label: Switch to the shape selection tool:
shape_selection_tool_key.description: Activate the shape selection tool to mark areas for editing.

fill_tool_key.label: Switch to the fill tool:
fill_tool_key.description: Activate the fill tool to fill areas with solid colors.

generation_area_tool_key.label: Switch to the image generation area selection tool:
generation_area_tool_key.description: Activate the generation area tool to pick an image area for AI image generation.

rotate_ccw_key.label: Rotate layer counter-clockwise:
rotate_ccw_key.description: Rotates the layer when the layer transformation tool is active

rotate_cw_key.label: Rotate layer clockwise:
rotate_cw_key.description: Rotates the layer when the layer transformation tool is active

new_image_shortcut.label: New Image
new_image_shortcut.description: Open a new image for editing.

save_as_shortcut.label: Save as
save_as_shortcut.description: Save current image as .png or .inpt at a new file path.

load_shortcut.label: Load Image
load_shortcut.description: Open an image file for editing.

reload_shortcut.label: Reload
reload_shortcut.description: Reload the image from its file.

redo_shortcut.label: Redo
redo_shortcut.description: Re-apply the last action reversed with undo.

cut_shortcut.label: Cut
cut_shortcut.description: Remove masked image content in the active layer.

copy_shortcut.label: Copy
copy_shortcut.description: Copy masked image content in the active layer.

paste_shortcut.label: Paste
paste_shortcut.description: Insert copied image data into a new layer.

resize_canvas_shortcut.label: Resize canvas
resize_canvas_shortcut.description: Change the image size without scaling layers.

scale_image_shortcut.label: Scale image
scale_image_shortcut.description: Scale image content to a new size.

image_to_layers_shortcut.label: Resize image to content
image_to_layers_shortcut.description: Resize the image to fit all layers

update_metadata_shortcut.label: Update metadata
update_metadata_shortcut.description: Update image metadata that will be saved with the file.

select_layer_content_shortcut.label: Select layer content
select_layer_content_shortcut.description: Select all non-transparent pixels in the active layer

new_layer_shortcut.label: New layer
new_layer_shortcut.description: Create a new layer above the active layer.

new_layer_group_shortcut.label: New layer group
new_layer_group_shortcut.description: Create a new layer group above the active layer.

copy_layer_shortcut.label: Copy layer
copy_layer_shortcut.description: Create a copy of the active layer.

select_previous_layer_shortcut.label: Select previous layer
select_previous_layer_shortcut.description: Switch to the next layer up.

select_next_layer_shortcut.label: Select next layer
select_next_layer_shortcut.description: Switch to the next layer down.

merge_layer_down_shortcut.label: Merge layer down
merge_layer_down_shortcut.description: Merge the active layer with the one below it

layer_to_image_size_shortcut.label: Layer to image size
layer_to_image_size_shortcut.description: Expand or crop the active layer to match the image bounds.

crop_to_content_shortcut.label: Crop layer to contents
crop_to_content_shortcut.description: Crop transparent borders in the active layer.

show_layer_menu_shortcut.label: Show layer window
show_layer_menu_shortcut.description: Open the image layer panel in a new window.

lcm_mode_shortcut.label: LCM Mode
lcm_mode_shortcut.description: Apply appropriate settings for the LCM LORA.

image_window_shortcut.label: Show Image Window
image_window_shortcut.description: Open a new window showing the edited image.
